name: Magiccards.info - Big Georgia
description:
Bumps up the size of all text to fill in some of that negative space, and changes the font to Georgia. I like it, you might.

I've found this works well with style 19182.

Also: If you prefer magiccards.info to Gatherer, you may be interested this redirection script I'm hosting at userscripts.org: http://bit.ly/LinkEnKor
